br.octahedron.cotopaxi.config
Class CotopaxiConfigViewImpl

java.lang.Object
  br.octahedron.cotopaxi.config.CotopaxiConfigViewImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CotopaxiConfigView
public class CotopaxiConfigViewImpl
extends Object
implements CotopaxiConfigView

The controller configuration. It makes possible do set/modify many Controller configuration parameters. Once this class is a modifiable version of the ControllerConfigView, it's only seen by the CotopaxiServlet and the CotopaxiConfigurator. Entities that need read access to the Controller Configurations parameters will access them using a CotopaxiConfigView. For understand the configuration workflow, see the internal comments at the CotopaxiServlet class.

Author:
Danilo Penna Queiroz - daniloqueiroz@octahedron.com.br
See Also:
CotopaxiConfigView
